name: EradiKate
about: Which skin type is it good for?.What it is:.Solutions for:.If you want to know more….What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: -Sulphur: Fights acne aids in eliminating existing imperfections and keeps new ones from occurring..-BHAs: Designed to reduce the appearance of enlarged pores...Sulphur, Isopropyl Alcohol, Zinc Oxide, Camphor, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Salicylic Acid, Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying medication..-Without shaking the solution, dip clean cotton swab into sediment and apply directly to blemishes..-To prevent excessive drying around treated area, limit use to one application daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out because I was in the midst of a really bad breakout and I was trying anything and everything in hopes of finding the right product.  I will say that the Kate Somerville EradiKate was helpful in drying the breakout areas.  However, the consistency is weird and wasteful: when you dip your Qtip in, the product comes out with huge clumps - and it goes on your skin like that too.  In comparison, Mario Badescu’s Drying Lotion does the same job, if not better, and the product comes out in a nice consistency, goes on evenly instead of in clumps, and helps to dry the surface of your skin.  So the product goes a lot farther than the EradiKate will.  Considering that the Mario Badescu is $24 and the Kate Somerville product is $38, I would never ever recommend the EradiKate!  Go for the tried and true Mario Badescu Drying Lotion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Context: I'm in my thirties with normal to dry, sensitive skin, and my experience using this product is as a spot treatment on hormonal cystic acne. I had a huge period / stress pimple brewing on the side of my face - right before a party, of course. The day of the party, my pimple was peak drama - huge, red, and angry, and starting to come to a head. It was going to be really difficult to cover with makeup. I rummaged through my skincare stash and found EradiKate - dipped a cotton swab in to get the pink stuff, and dabbed it right on the pimple. TWO HOURS LATER, the pus/oil/blood that had been coming to a head had been drawn out. (I saw it had seeped out through the pink stuff.) I got a cotton ball this time, wet it with warm water, and gently rubbed away the pink stuff and the pus/oil/blood. The pimple was still there, but a) the stuff at the surface had been drawn out, and b) the swelling had gone down considerably. It was SO much easier to cover, and was no issue for me during my party. Note that this was the only time I applied the treatment. The next day, the size and redness had come down even more, and now on day two, it's healed significantly. Without the application of this product, it would typically take my skin about a week to recover from this type of pimple. This will be a must-have for me moving forward! I highly, highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: I have struggled with problematic acne for years. I have extremely fair skin and so reducing redness and the appearance of my pimples relatively quickly is VERY important. This spot treatment is the best spot treatment I’ve ever tried. I have tried almost every spot treatment under the sun, including Mario Badescu’s version of this and it’s just not the same. I’m not saying this will magically make your pimple disappear within a matter of 10 minutes, but pimples that took over a week or two to heal, now only take a few days at max to mostly or completely disappear. However, it is very drying as other reviews have stated and so the surrounding area of the pimple has a tendency to become flaky and dry too (beware if you have dry skin already). My only complaint is that you do look a bit odd with little spots on your face ultimately meaning this can only be used at night if you have places to be during the day. I’d love if a more day-friendly version was available. Otherwise, I highly recommend if you’re looking for a good and fast spot treatment!

reviews.review_text: I have combination skin which leans more towards the dry side, but it’s still acne prone. Last week I had a horrible breakout and my forehead was covered in pimples. I bought this, used it at night, and woke up with significantly clearer skin. After three nights of use, my pimples are completely gone. I thought about giving this 4 stars due to the drying, but I don’t think that would be fair considering I expected it and that’s what salicylic acid does. Important note: I have always had pimple-free skin, but recently I moved from a very humid state to a very dry state, and I also changed some medication I take daily and I believe that this new medication has messed with my skin, causing hormonal pimples and more difficult to be treated and controlled, since I take the medication every day.

reviews.review_title: An absolute go-to for the stubborn acne!

En amour avec de produit. Les boutons paraissent beaucoup moi et ce, d\es le lendemain de l'application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

However the latter is easily removed with baking soda and hot water. If you can tolerate the smell and either take off your jewelry at night or don't mind cleaning it often, then this product is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this is a solid 4 star product and I'll probably repurchase it. I am 31 years old and have sensitive, dry, acne-prone skin. I don't get large breakouts anymore but usually have one or two small pimples and occasional larger ones. I apply this at night and leave it on overnight and remove whatever is left in the morning. For smaller pimples, this seems to be really effective at shrinking them overnight and by the second or third day they are gone. For larger/more stubborn spots, I can see that they shrink down but come back throughout the day so it takes longer for this product to work. I don't mind the pink colour as I'm a SAHM and online nursing student, so I will often apply in the morning as well to the larger spots. I love the smell!!! It's so earthy and nice, better than other sulphur products I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

However, if you have sensitive skin, patch test, put this ON TOP of your moisturizer, and don't use every day as it did irritate my skin a little on first use.  After some experimentation, I realized that to get the most out of it at nighttime, it works best if you put a hydrocolloidal patch on top (not the medicated ones, just plain ones from Amazon or the pharmacy). This dries into a sort of chalk, so the patch keeps it in place at night and absorbs any excess oils.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU'VE STRUGGLED WITH CYSTIC ACNE, TRY THIS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this product on a Youtube video about a year ago and decided to try it out about a month or so ago. I AM NOT KIDDING - it has been the ONLY thing that gets rid of my painful cystic acne within days. My break outs could get pretty bad, deep-rooted and painful with puss at times - ever since I started using this product though, my acne has not only reduced/dried up within a day or two, but also is not able to get that bad or go that far to be painful anymore. I don't get painful puss-full acne anymore because it's already reduces and goes away within a few days. Sometimes when I apply it on some areas of my face it'll sting for the first 5 seconds but then that goes away and it kind of just shows me it's working. I use this product specifically on the larger breakouts I have and then also apply it on the redness areas and I have seen a sigificant change in my skin since I've begun using it. I don't even think my prescription acne ointment works this efficiently at drying out the acne without drying out the rest of your skin/face. I would definitely recommend for anyone who is/has struggled with painful acne for a long time. I've had cystic acne for a few years now but it's finally cleared up enough (with regular use of this & Sephora's AHA night cream) that I can work on healing and clearing redness and acne scars and don't gotta struggle with painful acne every other day anymore. I still do get pimples (especially if I stop using this for a few days on new acne) but this product really helps to keep them at bay and lets my skin heal and clear up with the reduced amount of painful and deep rooted cystic acne. The reason why I took 1 star off is because when I use it around my nose or forehead, I guess because of the strong smell in it, sometimes my eyes get watery/sensitive. Additionally, once the liquid part of the product finishes, the pink part by itself isn't as effective. Other than this, this is honestly a game changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go-to for years to treat large hormonal acne.  However I did not realize that it was causing the acne to leave more prominent scars on my face.  While the alcohol does dry out the pimple at the surface, it does not do anything deep into the skin, leaving you with lasting issues like scabs and dried out skin.  By using these products be aware that it does not treat, only reduces on the surface, so the pimple may still be there deep. I would only recommend this for small surface blemishes.  I no longer use this, as I know more effective ways to treat my acne and prevent dried out scarring like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After indulging in some birthday treats, I had a breakout on my chin and only myself to blame. I'd used this product before but on a random spot or two. This was going to be the ultimate field test and I was low-key excited.⁠⁠As soon as I noticed the breakout happening, I applied this treatment to the impacted area. Formulated with 10% sulphur (the highest level allowed), BHAs, and zinc oxide, this beauty effectively targeted my blemishes, controlled excess oil production, and allowed my blemishes to heal in record time. Within 3 days, my red, sore, inflamed pores were unclogged and healing (scabbed over).⁠⁠There is no real scent to this and the application is quite interesting; you do not shake the bottle but instead dip a cotton swab into the pink sediment and then apply to your blemish. It dries down quickly and I didn't feel like it dried out my skin. Overall, it's a winner in my books!⁠

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all my life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I deal with persistent hormonal cystic acne that usually responds well to sulfur treatments. When my go-to spot treatment was discontinued I decided to try this, and it blows it out of the water!   If I catch a spot early enough it will flatten overnight. If I don't catch it early it will significantly reduce in size, or at the very least stop in its tracks and not get any bigger.   I apply it as a last step over my other skincare and it's still highly effective. Having that buffer also seems to have reduced irritation, as I haven't experienced any drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for those stubborn breakouts and also when you feel a breakout coming in - this helps dry it out. I have sensitive skin and I use this as a spot treatment sparingly. A little goes a long way. I apply it with a q tip and let it dry overnight and then cleanse in the morning. I notice a big difference with the size and texture of my breakout, it minimizes it a lot or completely dries it out. I use a very hydrating moisturizer to balance out my skin after using this. I wouldn't use this all over, been using it as a spot treatment and it has helped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and hormonal breakouts. So basically this is a miracle in a bottle. Never pop zits even though I definitely am guilty of that. It’s gentle so you won’t get any burns (cough cough Mario...) this brand is made by a dermatologist so you know you can trust it. Try it, it’s a good price and totally worth it and you will never have to deal with pimples during bad times such as grad, first date or anything. However, acne is not bad and if you have it you’re not ugly you are beautiful so embrace that!

reviews.review_title: WHY is the second ingredient ALCOHOL??
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been through quite a few bottles of this product, and I always thought it was helping to reduce my breakouts. However, after cutting it out of my routine (because of the isopropyl alcohol, which is an incredibly irritating & drying ingredient, especially for sensitive acne-prone skin), I realized that it really hasn't made much difference in how long my breakouts typically last. In fact, I think the reason I continued to use it for as long as I did is because there's something satisfying about covering up pimples with a spot treatment - it seems like it's doing something, because it hides the problem, until you wash it off of course.  I honestly feel a little betrayed after reading that isopropyl alcohol is the second ingredient listed in this product. If alcohol is listed as one of the first 6 ingredients, this is a bad sign. Even for normal skin types, this kind of alcohol seriously weakens and aggravates the skin. So any short-term benefits one might see are seriously outweighed by the long-term negative effects of using such harsh ingredients.

If you're looking for a solve for your acne, get a good retinol and some benzoyl peroxide and see a derm. If you're looking for a good occasional spot treatment, get this.

reviews.review_text: I'm 30 and have been struggling with acne since I was 12 so I have tried pretty much every acne product on the market. I have had periods of time where my skin has been clear on antibiotics, but the past year I have been managing with just over the counter products and an LED light panel (which I HIGHLY recommend anyone with acne should use). Recently though my chin has decided to breakout badly. Seriously woke up with new zits every morning. It felt like I was in high school again which is super frustrating. I was considering going back on antibiotics but thought I'd take my aesthetician's advice and give EradiKate a try for flare ups. The difference overnight was dramatic honestly. It smells life sulfur and shows up pink on your face, but if you are going to sleep does it matter?? I am so happy I found this product to use in case my face decides to go crazy. It is drying so be sure to moisturize the next day! Its also not meant for your whole face and I don't think its meant to be a long term cure, but it you have really bad breakouts that are random and concentrated in one or two spots, this is perfect. It dries them right up and lightens the dark spot that is left after. Seriously try it!!

I love this stuff, it is a definite game-changer; but my skin is also oily and very tough. If you have sensitive skin I would STAY AS FAR AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT AS POSSIBLE! reviews.review_title: This product is worth it's weight in gold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the rare products I would recommend for any skin type, the calamine type lotion with the sulphur liquid on top are a magic combo for regular acne, cystic acne and perioral dermatitis. I don't over use this because it can be quite drying when applied to the same spots but a few nights in a row and my skin is considerably cleared.   I am on my second bottle and the thing that helps with not using it up as quickly is to run your q-tip under water then give it a quick press to get some water out. That helps the sulphur and calamine stick to the exterior of the q-tip rather than absorbing it all the way down where you can't use it and end up wasting product.   The reason I added in cystic acne is that even though it's deep under the skin this helps to unclog the pore, when I do a hot compress and this over a couple days my cystic acne comes up much quicker. And for fellow PD sufferers you know how hard it is to find anything that doesn't make it worse and while I can't say for certain this will work for everyone since we all have different triggers it has worked for me, if you haven't tried it you should consider it for perioral dermatitis.

reviews.review_text: I am going through perimenapause and have ugly cystic acne that started last year. It was minimal and then just got worse over time with scars. Pro Active didn't work for me anymore after I hit perimenapause. The dermatologist cream/meds did not work and made worse. After researching I bought Somerville's kit and glad I did. Wash your face, let dry and then spot treat the infected areas. The rest of your face put the creamy acne med, let dry, then add moisturizer, but not the spotted parts. It took about 2 days for them to shrink, but not gone. After about 1 week 1/2 my face is nearly clear with only tiny bumps that are still working to go away completely. This keeps my cystic acne under control and/or away. I would suffer from one going away and then others would pop up together with no break at times. Give this a shot it won't hurt you.

My biggest complaint is that both jars I've purchased dried out before using all of the product. I think the clear liquid to pink mud ratio is off, if they added less pink and more clear it would solve the problem. I always take a bit of toner and swab the area I'm about to treat before applying this to make sure it has a clean surface for maximum effectiveness. Oh, and DO NOT shake! lol, every sample jar in the stores has obviously been shaken because they are always hard as a rock. This stuff works best on the occasional blemish, cystic blemishes not so much... just dries the skin terribly over the cystic pimple making it look a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: really really really gets the job done and i have seen significant improvement in my acne since starting using this product! would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have bad acne but I get occasional acne on my chin and where my glasses sit on my nose. When I do get acne it will be a painful cystic acne pimple. This product works well to dry it out. My only complaint is that sometimes when I put it between my eyes it gets into my eyes while I sleep. ( Definitely bad for me/ not supposed to be there )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this out of desperation as my face was suddenly and uncontrollably erupting hormonal acne!  After 1st application, they were noticeably calmer and by 3rd night they has shrunk.  I now use this on my skin nightly to keep the bumps away.  BUY THIS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Stops blemishes in their tracks and speeds up recovery. Very drying - so do not apply liberally - as it is a spot treatment. This is my go to for acne cysts or surface blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was good at first. It would really erraticate the pimple. Bit overtime, it was really drying on the skin and was leaving pigmented spots from the former acne. It smells awful. I think its really just calamine lotion and alcohol. Which for the price point is unreasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good makes my skin so clear. Makes pimples go away in a night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for drying out whiteheads! (I wouldn't expect it to work on blackheads or under-the-skin bumps). There is no miracle cure for acne, but after using it on pimples for 3 nights a row they're almost completely gone! Use sparingly (just a dot on each bump needed).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works so well in reducing the redness and size of acne overnight! I love this product a lot. The only thing that disappoints me about it is that the fluid surrounding the acne treatment dries up well before the bottle's expiration date, so you can't really get your full money's worth out of it. I have purchased this product twice now and it has happened to both of my bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seemed to work but the product dried up in the bottle after a bit. Wasted money. Won’t be buying this again. Hoping to find something better! I wouldn’t recommend buying this acne treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it for about 2 months, every other night (it dried my skin out if I used it too much). It was awesome, definitely helped me with hormonal breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This worked for me. Just dab it on and leave it overnight. It dries the zit. Don't overuse it or it will dry out your skin. Works best as soon as you feel a zit coming on. Took the pain away from the ones that hurt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving it one star only because it did not make a difference to my acne. I used it several nights, but did not clear my acne. I also tried using this product multiple times to see if it would eventually work, but it never did. Disappointed that it does not work on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't reduce the size or appearance of even mild small pimples . I have had much better results from cheaper drugstore spot treatments. The pink colour also means you cannot use it during the day. Didn't irritate the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The name speaks for itself, ERADIKATE THAT ZIT! That’s exactly what it does, I apply a lot of serums and creams for my evening routine and then dab with the EradiKATE on my stubborn spots and by morning it’s gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this spot treatment. Seems expensive but you can get over a month worth of spot treatment even using quite a bit of product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dries and clears my spots over night if caught early enough. Great stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Powerful little stuff. I put a dot on at night over upcoming blemishes and it really stops them in their tracks. Doesn’t disappear them, but they take maybe two or three days to go away instead of a week. Less time if you stop touching them. Hah.

reviews.review_title: It doesn’t work on cysric breakouts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I have been using the Eradikate facewash for a few months and i wanted to see if this helped with spot treatment. I am 33 years old medium complexion and have cystic acne under my jawline.  This product did not reduce the swelling or imflamation of new breakouts. It didn’t work at all for this purpose and waa pretty much useless.  I have switched back to using a benzolperoxide based sport treatment product.  Total waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Definitely have to use a couple nights in a row to see results but i don’t mind. This would’ve been very handy in high school for those under the skin zits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was having horrible HORRIBLE hormone acne all on and around my chin area and I was so depressed about it. So I consulted a Sephora agent and was recommended this product. I LOVE LOVE LOVE it. I have since not had any new breakouts and all my old breakouts have disappeared. I love this stuff and will buy it again and again!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's okay. I suffer from cystic hormonal acne (the deep, painful ones) and dab this on when I feel them forming or when they are formed. The smell is unpleasant but expected, and it can leave your pillowcase smelling like lingering sulphur. I put this on at nighttime and in the morning my pimples are either slightly smaller, or the same size. It lasts a long time too. I will probably not re-purchase as I did not see any significant difference using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on both small and large breakouts and absolutely nothing happened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my teenage kids cause you know how acne can be. It literally took a couple of days and their acne was mostly cleared up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on my little red pimples I was getting on my chin due to hormones (pms)  It didn’t help at all and left chemical burns on my chin which are only now fading after a few months. My entire chin area was red and burning for about a week after using this spot treatment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a lifesaver. I have hormonal acne and this helps it disappear overnight. Even though the bottle is small, it lasts for months. My only complaint is that because it dries the acne, I usually end up with a scab for a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It hurts to shell out 30$ for a tiny bottle, but this stuff lasts forever and completely changed my skin. It’s truly magic and one of my holy grail products. Can not recommend this enough. It’s perfect for people who get persistent acne and want a quick fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff works!!! My favorite spot treatment for the occasional pimple. I use it overnight and it really clears it up fast, and diminishes the look of a pimple drastically. So good to have in your skincare kit for emergencies!! I’ll use it when I can feel a bump under the skin that hasn’t surfaced yet, and this product stops it dead in its tracks. My only complaint is that this product is smelly, but it doesn’t bother me for the miracles it works. Make sure you read how to properly use this product!! Thanks Kate Somerville!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty effective but leaves an intense lingering sulphur smell even after you've washed/toned the following morning. Not great on cystic blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this but i found that it did nothing for my skin. It didn’t break me out more but it also didn’t clear up my acne any faster. It also made the skin around where i put it incredibly dry and flaky. I have oily/combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I read rave reviews and really wanted to love this product but honestly it didn’t work for me at all. And to top it off if you use this you can’t really use a moisturizer afterwards because the treatment sits on your face all night. I had better results with Clean and Clear acne treatment from the drugstore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get adult cystic acne.  (Im 44 years old) Let me tell you....This WORKS! I have been to the dermatologist, used everything they prescribed.  And nothing worked like this for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I’ve seen other companies try to replicate this and jack up the price, try and say it’s only available through them, but thank goodness I found this. I suffer from acne and this stuff is the bomb, it doesn’t stain your clothes while sleeping and literally clears up the worst blemish overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for superficial blemishes, whiteheads and what not. Noticeably dries and shrinks them overnight! However, it smells like straight up farts. Because it's not something you can wear under makeup (it's pink and chalky) you'll prob want to use it at night... and it will make your pillow smell gross. So like, not great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. I've never had great luck with acne spot-treatments before, but I like this one. I've slept with it on and I do notice a difference when I wake up in the morning. I've mainly been treating just little whiteheads and red bumps I can see starting to form. When I wake up in the morning the redness has definitely faded and it seems like the whiteheads have shrunk. What I really like about it is that it does this without drastically drying out my skin, which so many other spot-treatments do. I'll definitely keep using this regularly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh wow. I’ve been using this spot treatment on and off for about a year, but now that I’m being diligent with my skin care routine, I’ve been using it more frequently. This spot treatment WORKS. Whether it’s a pimple that’s underground, or one that’s been there— it. WORKS. I’ll apply it in the evening, wait for it to dry and in the morning, POOF— that sucker is gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I'm in my late 30s and have the occasional pimple. This is the only product that have kept my face clear. I find that you have to apply it the minute you feel the pimple coming, before the bump forms and turns white. When I do, it works great. If I am ever late applying the treatment, it only controls the pimple from getting bigger, but won't eliminate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove this product! It definitely helped with my acne (especially the big hormonal pimples that HURT!) my only issue was that there wasn’t enough equal product to be able to use the whole bottle of it.

reviews.review_title: Best on the market in my opinion!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. It has helped so much with my hormonal acne. I was first recommend this product by my dermatologist who said that the sulfur would really help with my acne. It drys the spots up within just a day or two. Definitely recommend giving a try if you also suffer from any kind of acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought my third bottle of this treatment and I can't say enough good things about it. It helps any pimple come to the surface quicker and then the treatment will dry it out within a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the most effective acne treatment I have come across. If I see a spot flaring up I just dab a little of it, and by the next day it's much smaller, and by the second day it's gone. A tip if you see the solution drying out as you reach the bottom, you can always add a mixture of isopropyl alcohol and purified water. Exact ratio I'm not too sure but I make sure I don't dilute the alcohol to a point that I can't smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using the product about 2 days ago. I’m in my mid 20’s and the second I turned 25 my skin started to change. I never had any acne as a teenager. I would get a blemish here and there, but nothing serious. All of a sudden I’m struck with adult acne and extremely oily skin. I started breaking out on my jawline like crazy. As of right now I have at least 10 blemishes on my face. I read about this and noticed that this is common for women in their 20’s and 30’s. I read about what products can help with this and saw Kate Somerville Eradikate on the list. Luckily my sister purchased this product a few months ago, so I was able to give it a go before deciding if I wanted to purchase it for myself. I have been using the product for 2 days now and I do notice a difference. My blemishes are smaller and less red. They are not completely gone, but the type of blemishes I have on my jawline are large and hard, so they will take some time to go away. If you are dealing with adult acne like I am I would definitely give this product a try. It seems to be working well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although not effective at all on cystic breakouts, EradiKate did a great job of drying out regular pimples.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually review products, but this is too amazing not to! I've struggled with my skin for a decade and have finally dealt with it from the inside out, but I occasionally still get cystic pimples and this stops them in their tracks and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Just a dab as soon as you feel a cystic bump, worn overnight, and it shrinks them drastically so they're almost gone in a few days. Instead of having to deal with a growing cystic bump for 4-6 weeks, it's gone in less than one. I use it on every pimple that tries to pop up. The sulfur smell can be a little strong, but it's not overwhelming and is worth it for what it does to keep my pimples from getting out of control. It is a little drying, but for my oily skin it's been a benefit. It's pretty much magic!

reviews.review_title: Does not work - only dried skin out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Had high hopes for this product, however it was only a disappointment. I used it daily for 2 weeks, but all it did was dry my skin out and make it pink while the formula was on. Also, really annoying to have to keep using cotton swabs - why does it not come with an applicator?

reviews.review_title: Part of my acne fighting kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over 3 years now. I love this product to death! The main problems are the difficulty in applying the product on, you need to use a q-tip and make sure that the product is settled. I get everyone I know to use it and they love it!  10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for spot treatment! Only put it on problem spots as it dries out your skin. I dab a little on my spot at night and it will be gone in the morning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not notice a big difference in the size of any pimples on my face when I used this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews I thought it is a magical product for acne. It is not. It doesn't even shrink the size of acne let alone making it disappear. It also smells terrible and leaves mark on pillow covers and also make pillows smell really bad if you don't change them daily. A $7 OTC acne creams works waaaay better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. It dried my acne in about 2 days. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff does stink, but it does really dry pimples out well. I'd suggest immediately doing a bit of a wash on your face to really get the stuff off before drying with your towel because the smell will get on your towel otherwise

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used all of this! Use it with a q tip and follow instructions! I could defiantly see a difference especially with some of my pimples after few days ! Best to use at early stages of the pimple

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hasn’t solved my acne problems, but I still make sure to always have this on hand because it really does reduce the size of a big cystic pimple over night. Absolutely doesn’t completely get rid of anything entirely (I’ll keep trying new products until I find one that does), but this has drying effects that really do help.  It also tends to dry out the whole area around the breakout as well, so I usually use an oil the next morning and avoid foundation the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works like wonder on my acne, however it is a little drying because of the alcohol. Be sure to use a non-greasy moisturizer afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this for two weeks now and let me tell you, this little bottle right here is an absolute miracle worker. I put it on right before bed to any little bumps I see forming and by morning it’s like they never existed. My skin has been so clear I don’t know what I did without it. I’ve been worried it would dry out my skin but I really haven’t noticed any dryness but I am an avid moisturizer user.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm glad I tried this product because I know it works for a lot of poeple, but for me, I'm not sure it does anything to be honest. I still wear it at night when I have nothing else to apply on my zits but I have tried better products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anybody can use this . Might make your skin a tad dry . If I didn’t have a chance to wear it at night , it helps to wear it an hour or so before I put on makeup as I have very oily skin . Really dries up acne . Does what is says. This is another of my favorite brands !

reviews.review_title: The BEST spot treatment for sensitive skin!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with very sensitive skin and frequent breakouts this is magic! I put it on at night and in the morning my bumps are either completely gone or just about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I got this it has 3 months to expire, how can I complete it within 3 month, horrible shopping experience at Sephora

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hassle to use. Dried up on me after five uses- the formula ended up mixing together and it turned into a pasty, thick concoction akin to Calomine Lotion. Difficult to rate effectiveness. I would not purchase again, unless they turned this solution into a pad or something like that. I don’t think this works well in it’s current form, because the chance of it mixing together and turning into a paste is too great. I wanted to travel with it and of course that increases the likelihood for it to be shaken up, etc. Just not useful for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bc of the sulphur, it definitely smells, but less though than some comparable products with sulfur. It definitely works and helps shrink pimples. I think it's rather over priced especially for the amount you are getting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did more harm then good. I returned this product gave a star because I had to but would not give any if I had the choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product to be very good for my acne. my skin started to break out pretty bad over the summer time and then I used this to help clear my skin. I do find it to work either under or over a moisturizer.
